definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: Cut the shrimps in half and marinate with pinchof salt and pepper for about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蝦仁切半，用一小撮食鹽和胡椒粉醃製5分鐘。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effects of piperine on sleep in mice and rabbits, and analyse anticonvulsant action of piperine in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究胡椒鹼對動物睡眠的影響及其抗驚厥作用。

sentences.english: Shred chicken, stir in salt and white pepper. Stand for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 先將雞肉切絲，再加入鹽及胡椒粉，醃約15分鐘。

sentences.english: Pepper, Chilli, Coriander Leaf, Cloves , Herbal Spices (Organic.
sentences.chinese: 採購產品胡椒粉，智利，芫荽葉，丁香，草藥的藥料。

sentences.english: Hmm…Black pepper beef, fried shrimp and hot&sour soup.
sentences.chinese: 嗯黑胡椒牛柳，油煎大蝦，再來個酸辣湯吧。

sentences.english: There are some bags of pepper with dry water stains in Hatch No. 5. Please put them aside for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 五艙有一些帶幹水漬的胡椒袋，暫時把它們放在那兒。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食鹽，檸檬汁，孜然粉，橄欖油和胡椒粉調味。

sentences.english: The sauce was zapped with pepper.
Supply 1 tsp chilli flake, season with salt and pepper. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加1勺辣椒粉，適量鹽和胡椒，拌勻。

sentences.english: He wanted a little more pepper to spice up his rump steak.
sentences.chinese: 他想再加一點胡椒粉給他的菲力牛排調味。

sentences.english: Add sea salt and pepper on both sides of the salmon.
sentences.chinese: 三文魚柳以鹽及胡椒調味。

sentences.english: Pepper tickles if it gets into the nose.
sentences.chinese: 胡椒進入鼻孔會使人發癢。

sentences.english: You won't find jalapeno peppers in many chocolate bars, I think.
sentences.chinese: 你通常很難在巧克力棒裏喫到胡椒末。

sentences.english: Add additional cracked pepper and the grated cheese.
sentences.chinese: 另外還可加些胡椒粉和磨碎的乳酪。

sentences.english: Omelette or you can sprinkle in some pepper, fine salt.
sentences.chinese: 在煎蛋時或可以灑些胡椒粉，細鹽。

sentences.english: Pat brisket dry; sprinkle all over with salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 拍幹牛胸肉上的水分，撒上鹽和胡椒。

definition: nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
